group_1.narration: Days after the party, @I was still feeling lighter than air.
Ultimately, I received happiness @from everyone else being happy...
But maybe that's a good thing, @because it means we're all happy.
I wish I could be the one giving it more, @but for now, this will do...

group_1.textCenter: (I'd love it if we could get everyone together @like that again.)

group_1.narration: But that happiness wasn't going to last.

group_1.textLeft: Iroha, you have a call from the hospital.
It's from Touka Satomi's father...
Sis...!

group_1.textRight: Ui...! Where are Touka and Nemu?

group_1.textLeft: It seemed like they pushed themselves too hard, @and their conditions suddenly plummeted...
If...if they both die...what will I...?

group_1.textRight: ...It's okay. It's going to be okay, Ui…

group_1.textCenter: Ah, there you are... I'm glad you're still here.

group_1.textLeft: We managed to save them.
Yeah...that's good... Very good...

group_1.narration: Once again...@I learned how an ordinary life is so precious... @That as long as you're alive, @that's all that matters...
I realized how important it is @that the people I care about are alive and happy... @How important it is that things go on as usual... @I was given a very painful reminder of that.

group_1.textLeft: ...Do you feel a bit better now, Ui?
...Well, let's take a detour and treat ourselves @to something on our way home.

group_1.textRight: ...I'm not in the mood for a treat, actually...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...let's just go straight home, then.

group_1.narration: "Hey, did you see the look on her face today?"@"Yeah, like, 'If you have something to say, just say it.'"@"But she's getting boring now; @she doesn't even say anything anymore. @Maybe she's getting sick of it, ahaha."
"Hey, watch it, you old hag!"@"I-I'm sorry..."

group_1.textCenter: (I don't remember the town...@being this disgusting...)
(A town that makes you feel sad...@was that it...?)

group_1.narration: "Next up... A female high school senior @was gravely injured when she @was hit by a car in Minaminagi Ward."
"According to police, the injured student @was trying to save a young boy nearby @from being hit instead..."

group_1.textCenter: (I just tried to avert my eyes from @the things I didn't like...)

group_1.narration: Just as there are many kinds of happiness, @there are many kinds of unhappiness, too.
That older man, for instance... @He's struggling with his luggage, @but no one cares to help him...
No...not just him... @Everyone is indifferent to others; @they don't see each other... @Am I like that, too? @For having not paid attention until now...?

group_1.textRight: Sis...are you okay? You look so pale...

group_1.textLeft: (I don't know... My heart is beating so painfully...)
Oh, I'm sorry, Ui... Let's go home...

group_1.narration: *CRACK*[se:3001_chara_damage]
"AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!"

group_1.textLeft: Wh...what's...this...?

group_1.narration: "Someone fell off the top of that building! @She landed in the alleyway!"@"A girl... Someone call an ambulance!"@"It doesn't look like a murder, @but I don't think an ambulance @is gonna do anything at this point..."

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Ah... Ah... That...girl...

group_1.narration: Beyond the crowd, at the end of the alley... @I saw a bright red pool of blood...@and a girl in the same uniform @as mine in the midst of it... @And she was someone I had seen before...

group_1.textLeft: ...Ui, NO! Don't look at her...!

group_1.narration: "Huh...? Isn't that girl the one we...?"@"Fucking really?"
I was left dizzy from the malice@in the words I heard all around me... @From what a kind world I had lived in... @From how little I knew about the rest of it...
I was in shock when Yachiyo and Sana, @who happened to be running some errands, @ran over to support us. @We all went home together.
I heard nothing of what they were saying @or what they were talking about. @All I saw in my mind was bright red...

group_1.textLeft: Would you like some tea...?
At least it sounds like Touka and Nemu @survived...
Yes...but seeing that...

group_1.textRight: Ugh...I need to use the bathroom...

group_1.textLeft: I'll accompany you, Ui...

group_1.textRight: People like Touka and Nemu want @to live so badly...

group_1.textLeft: ...When you're in a bad situation...
...You start thinking that it's never going to get @better, and there's only one way out...
...I think...that girl was bullied into @believing that...

group_1.textRight: Yes, bullying...even though we went @to the same school...
I...couldn't help her. I had no idea there was @bullying going on...
I didn't see anything horrible or @bad happening...

group_1.textLeft: You're a transfer student, and from a different @class. You couldn't be expected to know.
People don't see things outside their sphere @of influence.
It's a given for your age.
A middle schooler doesn't need to see things @so broadly.
That's not your role to begin with.
That's the job of the teachers, the adults. @You don't have to torture yourself over this.
...So please don't blame yourself.
...I think it might help if you go to bed @early today.
And I think you should stay home from @school tomorrow, too.

group_1.narration: Even though I closed my eyes, I couldn't sleep. @Instead, that vision remained stuck in my head, @whirling in my thoughts, and refusing to disappear...
What could I have done to help that girl? @And not just her, but for the misfortune @of all the people I'd never met.@What was I supposed to do?
How could I make everyone happy? @I want a world where no one is sad...
If I had called out to her when I first saw her. @If I had been aware that there was bullying. @If. If. If―
It only became harder to count all @those "what ifs" that would never come true. @All I could do was wait for the morning to come.
